ModMetaData.name: Rimfire 2.5
ModMetaData.author: Alistaire
ModMetaData.description:
REQUIRES HugsLib 6.1.1+ by UnlimitedHugs
Rimfire adds fourty-eight weapons in a style similar to the vanilla set. Each weapon can be toggled individually in the HugsLib Mod Option Menu in the settings menu with HugsLib active.
